column4: the mplayer binary downloaded from medibuntu complains of dependencies when I try to install using "dpkg -i" How can I auto-resolve the deps. I have ubuntu-dvd-iso in apt-sources
how can I add a directory full of .debs to my apt sources list
you can install them all at once with dpkg -i *.deb if they are all dependencies of one another.
Do you have an internet connection on that computer?
